{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DI-624 |revision=D2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/30/2005 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2DI624D2 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2316A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1605AMC-15G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V64S40ETP-G6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2316A |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=ThreadX;G4.0.4.0; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:15:E9 |oui_eth=00:15:E9 |default_ch= }} The OEM for this device appears to be '''Cameo'''.
==Stock firmware== '''di624revD_firmware_404.bin''' <small>(md5: af2f30a9a0ac36fe8c5c65a9bf539293)</small> - multiple bundled compressed ARJ files ('''BAK.MEM''', '''NML.MEM'''), '''ThreadX''' based, '''AP52-AR2316-RT''' HW string :'''ThreadX''' version string - <small>'''Copyright (c) 1996-2001 Express Logic Inc. * ThreadX JADE/Green Hills Version G4.0.4.0 *'''</small>
